comment: Elements of the class of reflexive relations which are elements of the class of symmetric relations as well (like the elements of the class of equivalence relations ~ dfeqvrels2 ) can use the restricted version for their reflexive part (see below), not just the ` ( _I i^i ( dom r X. ran r ) ) C_ r ` version of ~ dfrefrels2 , cf. the comment of ~ dfrefrels2 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 20-Jul-2019.)
